name: The Life of Steven Seagull
description:
Join Steven Seagull in his daily beachside quest to collect as many chips as possible that have been dropped by those careless humans coming out of the fish and chip shop in this simple but fun retro-style game.

As Steven himself will tell you the play is simple:

So come and try The Life of Steven Seagull -- completely free on itch.io.

We wish you ....
